alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LAURENS...SOUTHEASTERN GREENVILLE...SOUTHERN SPARTANBURG...EASTERN ABBEVILLE...NORTHWESTERN UNION AND GREENWOOD COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 422 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Spartanburg to 13 miles south of Abbeville. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Laurens, Abbeville, Clinton, Fountain Inn, Woodruff, Ware Shoals, Ninety Six, Gray Court, and Cross Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Greenwood; Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg; Union
